tr.td: Jerry Beguelin MD and Esther Schulz DO

td.content: s:75 YO male presents with 13 months history of severe increasing irritability, being snappy towards people, unable to hold a job, often tearful for no reason. describes drinking an average of 12 drinks a week for about 3 years in his past Denies ever using tobacco o:Height 67 in, Weight 118 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 110, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 17 a:Depression p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to psychiatry.

td.content: s:patient presents with severe taking no pleasure in doing activities and has not appetite for food and feels worthless and guilty, severe thoughts of death frequently but denies suicidal thoughts, Mental Health. patient also reports of severe increasing irritability, being snappy towards people, unable to hold a job, often tearful for no reason. he is a male aged 75 ys. o:Height 67 in, Weight 118 lbs, Temperature 98 F, Pulse 71, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 71, Respiration 17 a:Depression p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered Urine toxicology.

s:76 yo white male retired presents with 11 days history of worsening severe thoughts of death frequently but denies suicidal thoughts, severe increasing irritability, being snappy towards people, unable to hold a job, often tearful for no reason, severe taking no pleasure in doing activities and has not appetite for food and feels worthless and guilty and Mental Health. Patient does not smoke he consumes 2 drinks per night o:Height 67 in, Weight 120 lbs, Temperature 99.2 F, Pulse 92, SystolicBP 113, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, Urine toxicology cocaine (-), PCP (-),TCAs serum concenteration (+) a:Depression p:administered trazodone - 75 mg /day, performed Urine toxicology, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.
